    • Method Detail

      • performSearch

        public static java.util.List<PackageOverview> performSearch(java.lang.Long sessionId,
                                            java.lang.String searchString,
                                            java.lang.String mode,
                                            java.lang.String[] selectedArches,
                                            java.lang.Long relevantUserId,
                                            java.lang.Boolean fineGrained,
                                            java.lang.Long filterChannelId,
                                            java.lang.String searchType)
                                                     throws XmlRpcFault,
                                                            java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                                            SearchServerIndexException
        Will form a search request and send message to search server
        Parameters:
        sessionId - session id
        searchString - search string
        mode - mode as in name only, name description, name and summary, free form
        selectedArches - list of archs
        relevantUserId - user id to filter by if relevant or architecture search server the user can see is subscribed to
        fineGrained - fine grained search
        filterChannelId - channel id to filter by if channel search
        searchType - type of search to do, one of "relevant", "channel", "architecture", or "all"
        Returns:
        List of PackageOverview objects
        Throws:
        XmlRpcFault - bad communication with search server
        java.net.MalformedURLException - possibly bad configuration for search server address
        SearchServerIndexException - error executing query
